name: Calm Emotions
description: You attempt to suppress strong emotions in a group. Each humanoid in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range makes a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, choose: (1) suppress any effect causing a target to be charmed or frightened; or (2) make the target indifferent about creatures of your choice it is hostile toward. The effect ends if the target is attacked or witnesses harm to its allies.
